text: BE MUNECA CYNNE.
Syx synt muneca cynerena, þara synt þreo þa selestan, þa oþere þreo þa forcuþestan and eallum gemete to forbugenne.

Þæt forme cyn is mynstermanna, þe gemænan life drohtniað on mynstre, gelice þam halgum, þe þæm apostolum folgodon and ealle æhta becypton and þearfum todeldon and swa forð heora gemæne lif heoldon, þæt hy forþon þæt word na cwædon, þæt hi agen ænig þing hæfdon.
Þurh þara apostola angin and þara, þe him folgodan, munuclif wurdon begunnene.

Oþer cyn is muneca, þæt is westensetlan, þe feor fram mannum gewitað and westestowa and ælætu and anwunung gelufiað, geefenlæcende Elian, þone mæran witegan, and Johannem, þone fulluhtere, þa þurhwununge on westenes innoþe heoldon.
Swilce westensetlan eornestlice þisne middangeard forhogiaþ and on westenes wununge gelustfulliað, be wyrtum anum libbende, oþþe be hlafe and wetere, se him biþ broht on gesettum timum.

Swa dihlice wuniende hy fram manna gesyhðe ascyriaþ and Godes agenre spræce gelomlice brucaþ, þæm hy mid clænum mode hy sylfe beþeoddan and for his lufan þisne middangeard and manna geþeodrædenne forsawan.

Þridde cyn is ansetlena, þe on mynsteres wununge fulfremede sindon and hie sylfe on syndrigum husum for Godes lufan belucaþ and hy sylfe fram manna gesyhþe ascyriende nara manna nealæcynge na underfoþ, ac on Godes besceawunge anre libbaþ.
Feorðe cyn is þara, þe hy under leasum hiwe ansetlan teliaþ.

Be swa geradum Sanctus Casianus cwyþ, þæt hi mid ungesceade on þam frumwylme heora gecyrrednesse hy sylfe fulfremede taliaþ, ac hy swiþe recene awlaciaþ and swindende acoliaþ, þonne hy þa ealdan unðeawas and leahtras ascunian nellaþ, ne eaþmodnesse iuc and geþyldes na leng befeolan nellaþ, ne heora ealdra gebodum hyrsumian nellaþ, forþi ansetles wununge geceosaþ, þæt hi geþwære and eaþmode geþuhte syn and hi nan man gegremian ne dyrre.
Ne wyrþ næfre fulfremed, se þe on þus niwan anginne ansetla beon wile.

Ne beoð his unþeawas gewanode mid þysum anginne, ac swiðe miclum geeacnode; ðonne heora unðeawas fram nanum men gebette ne beoþ, eal hi weaxaþ on yfel, swa swa atres unlibba on men, swa he leng þæs attres þigene bedihlað, swa his untrumnes mare.
Nan man ne dear for arwyrðnesse þæs ansetlan leahtras tælan; him synt eac þa ungeselþa leofran, þæt he hy nyte, þænne he hi lacnige.

Fifte cyn is widscriþelra hleapera, þe under muneces gegyrlan æghwider scriþaþ, swilce hy licetunge to ceape lædan; ða þurh nanes mannes sande ne farað, faraþ þeah geond missenlice þeoda, nefre staþolfeste, næfre wuniende, nahwar sittende.

Idele and lease spel hi hywiaþ and mannum reccaþ, be wenan hi healdaþ God ælmihtigne; sume martyra lima geahniaþ, and an tweon is, hwæder hy martyras syn; sume heora fnada and wrædas gemiccliaþ, idel lof fram mannum begytende.
Sume sidfeaxe gaþ, þæt seo bescorene halignes ne sy weorþre, þenne seo unbescorene, þæt hy þurh þæt wiðmetene syn Samuele and Elian and oþerum halgum, þe sidfeaxe wæron.

Sume secgaþ, þæt hy micelne weordscype and rice magas on heora earde hæfdon and þa eft geneosian willaþ; ealle hi biddað and wilniaþ þa heafene þysse gestreonfullan wædle, oþþe his lease hiw on halignesse wyrð.
Ðonne hy on heora dædum and on yfelum wordum arasode beoð and on sumon gemete onfundene, on gemænum naman muneca ingehyd byð gehyrewed.

Þæt sixte muneca cyn is ealra forcuþost and swiðost forsewen, þæt asprang on anginne cristendomes þurh Annanian and Saphiran, and mid þes apostoles Petres reþnysse wurdon forslægene, forþam þe hy ascyriað hy sylfe fram mynsterlicum þeawum and heora agenum lustum filiaþ, hy synt egyptiscan gereorde genemnede sarabagite oððe renuite, þæt ys sylfedeman and widersacan.
Hi tymbriaþ him stowa and hy leasum naman mynstra hataþ, nellað hy ealdras habban, ne be heora tecinge libban on þeowdome, ac be heora agenum lustum.

To geflites hi swincað on weorce, no toþi, þæt hi heora geswinces gestreon þearfum delen, ac þæt hy feoh gestrynen and on hyrde lecgen; be heom cwyð Sanctus Hieronimus, swa hwæt swa hy heora geswinces becypaþ, þæt byþ maran wyrðes, swilce heora cræft sy halig and na heora lif.
Soþlice, se sylfa Hieronimus be heom cwyþ, to geflites hy fæstaþ and, þæt digle þing beon scolde, to sige, þæt is to bodunge and to getotes gylpe, gewyrcaþ.
Hy gelyst ealces ydeles, habbaþ side earmellan and pohhede hosa, stiþe reaf gelomlice hy anscuniaþ, fæmnhadesmen hi geneosiaþ, preostas tælaþ and þonne freolstid biþ, hy beoþ oferfyllede oþ spiweþan.
Betweoh cenobium and monasterium þyllic todal wyrhð Sanctus Casianus, þæt monasterium mæg beon gehaten anes muneces wunung, cenobium ne byð genemned buton manegra wunung.
Þara drohtnunge ic gesweotelige, swa swa ure forþfæderas hit gesettan.

Hi witodlice, swa swa we ær cwædon, ærest þis lif forseoð and ealles þysses lifes unalyfednessa, and halige drohtnunge on gemænum life healdaþ, heora lif hy adreogaþ on halgum gebedum, on rædincgum, on smegeongum, on wæccum, on fæstenum, ne synt hy na toþundenne mid ænigre modignesse, ne synt hy ættrene þurh andan, ac hy synt gemetfæste and glæde and sceamfæste, and geþwærum life hy lifiaþ, heora geþohtas him betweonan anwreoð, gemænelice hy smeagaþ and rihtað.

Nan heora eorðlices nan þing synderlice nah, mid deorwyrþum reafum and gefagedum ne beoþ hy gescrydde, ac mid unweorþum and anfealdum; baþa hy næfre brucaþ for heora lichoman luste, ac seldon for heora untrumnesse neode.
Hy nahwider faraþ butan þæs abbodes ræde, ne nan þincg beginnaþ butan þæs ealdres geþafuncge; hy wyrcaþ mid heora handum, þæt hyra lichoma mid afedd sy and heora mod fram drihtne ne sy gehremmed.
Mid heora handum wyrcende heora sealmas singaþ, swylce hy heora geswinc mid godcundre gladunge gefremmen.
Þæt þæt hy wyrcaþ, hy betæcaþ hit heora teoþingealdrum, þæt hy butan hoge and care syn ealra þinga, þe to heora lichoman belimpeð, oþþe on æte, oþþe on scrude, oþþe on oþrum neadbehefum þingum.

Ða teoþincgealdras þæt ylce þam prafestan betæcaþ, se prafast þonne þæt mid micelre embhydignesse fadaþ and gegearewaþ, swa hwæt swa heora lif for lichamlicre untrumnesse behofaþ; se sylfa profast gescead agylt þem, þe hy fæder nemnaþ, þæt is þæm abbode.

Þa federas þænne scealon beon foremære on andgite, on þylde, on gesceade; hi þonne eaþmode and nan þincg modige framigaþ heora bearnum, mid miclan heora gebodes <ealdorscipe> and mid micclan willan heora beorna hyrsumnysse.

Hy gegaderiaþ hy swiþe gelomlice dæges and nihtes mid micclan ofste to heora tidsangum, gesealdum beacne; mid micelre gymenne heora heortan heora tida singaþ, oþ þæs sealmsanges ende butan æþrote þurhwuniende.
Eft hy gaderiaþ hy on nixtnig, þæt hy raca gehyren æt heora fæder.
Hi þonne be heora race gehyraþ mid micelre gecneordnesse and mid healicum swigean, mid geomrunge and mid wope hi getacniaþ heora modes lufe, be þam þe hy gemyndige beoþ mid þæs reccendun spræce.

Hy siþþan heora lichoman mid micelre swigan gereordaþ, swa micel þicggende, swa hy heora hæle mid gehealden megen; on eallum ætum mid forhæfednesse gifernesse gewilnunge wildaþ, þæt heora heortan furþum mid wacum mettum and unweorþum ne syn ofersymede.
Witodlic fram flæsce and wine hy forhabbaþ, toþy þæt hy ælcne galscype on hy gewylden, na þæt an, ac fram eallum þam þigenum, þe hracan oþþe innoþ to miclum luste getyhþ.

Eallunga swa hwæt swa hy gespariaþ on heora forhæfednessæ and swa hwæt swa toforan þam neadbehefum belifen byþ on heora mægenes tilunge, mid swiþe micelre embhydignesse þearfum gedælaþ and swa micel to lafe lætaþ, swa hy nede habban scylan.
To þes halgan þeowdomes ingehyde cumaþ na þa ane, þe freo synt, ac gyt ma þa, þe æhtborene synt and oþera manna freosceattas and for þam anum foroft gefreode.
Of cyrliscum life and of folclicum gedeorfe gehwelces creftes men to þam ylcum Godes þeowdomes gecampe gecyrraþ, þa butan tweon swa micele eaðelicor and sel drohtniaþ, swa hy stiþlice afedde wæron.
Gif man swilce underfon nelle, hit byþ swiðe hefigtyme gylt.
Heora formænig foremære wearþ and earfoþe to geefenlæcenne, forþy God þa unstrangan þyses middangeardes geceas, þæt þa strangmodan, þe on agenum mihtum truwiaþ, gescende wurdon.
Þa he eac geceas, þe dyselice and nahtlice geþuhte synt, þæt þa, þe mid ofermettum hy sylfe for aht teliaþ, aidele, þæt nan þing flæsclices beforan Gode mid getote ne bogie.

Witodlice, þam ylcum gemete wuniaþ and gyt aþolede synt munecena mynstru, þe man hurum dryhtne ymbhydelice and clenlice on þeowiaþ; þara wunung is ascyred and asyndrod feor fram munecum; hi beoþ him þeah geþeodde mid soþre lufe and mid æfæsnesse heora halignysse and mid efenlæcinge haligra mægena.
Nis nanra geongra manna neosung to þæm, ne forþon þeah hy fulripode syn and wel afandode, buton þara anra, þe for neode him þenunge æt þæs mynstres ingange ræcan scylon.

Heora wealdaþ anlipige staþalfeste and wel afandode and on heora ealdorscype heora underþeodra þeawas gestaþeliaþ and gefrætewiaþ, ne þæt an, ac gyt swiþor heora mod getimbriaþ, gelæraþ and gegearwiaþ.
Mid willenum reafe heora lichoman gegearwiaþ and gescyrdaþ, hy munecum reaf syllaþ and munecas him bileofan.
Ane þeawas, an lif and ane gesceadwisne hi healdaþ muneca mynstra on eallum þingum.
Munucas þurh heora eaþmodnesse hy beoþ gecorene and Gode andfencge.
Heora formænig mid idelum lofe byþ besmittad and mit þam leasum gylpe beswicen, manige hy anhebbaþ for heora miclan forhæfednesse, menige eac for heora lare.
God hy wyrcaþ, ac þæt for idelum lofe and na for ecum life, ac þurh þæt gewilniaþ ideles lofes wulder, þæt hy mid toþundennysse cumen mægen to geþincðe þæs gewilnedan wyrþmyntes.

Betweoh swylcum ungeþwærnessa aspringaþ; gif hwylc broþor on Gode þyhþ, on þæt hy andiaþ, him sihþ on þyssa hwilwendra þinga lufu, hi swiþe grædilice eorþcundum lustum filigaþ and oft swiþe sceamleaslice on manna gesyhþe.
Þa þe þyllice beoþ, nateshwon hy na synt to nemnenne munecas, forþy þe hy ne sint Gode geþeodde mid godum dædum, ac mid worda andetnesse.
BE MYNSTRES SACERDUM AND HYRA ÞENUM.

Gif hwylc abbod geþafaþ, þæt mæssepreost oþþe diacon in to mynstre gange, toþy þæt hy messan singan and þa andrysnan þenunge mid arwyrþnesse gefyllen, syn hy swa gecorene, þæt hy untæle syn and sacerdhades þurh ealle gode cysta wel wyrþe.
Syn hy clængeorne, geþyldige and eaþmode, bewarnian hy georne wiþ upahæfednesse and modignesse; ne hy nan þing ne gedyrstlæcen, ne nænne ontige on þam mynstre butan þære mæssan anre.
Ne hy nane spræce wiþ þa gebroþra agen; ne hy þærinne leng ne wunien, þonne seo mæsse gesungen sy, ac sona swa seo mæsse gesungen sy, hi eaþmodlice utgan.
Warnian þa gebroþra georne, þæt hy nane syndrigan spræce wiþ þa mæssepreostas næbben, ne wiþ heora þeningmen.

Gif þara gebroþra hwylc his diglan synna þæm mæssepreoste andettan wille, sy þæt gedon be þæs abbodes leafe innan cirican, na on digelre stowe, ac swa, þæt þa gebroþra him onlocian mægen, ealswa hit þurh þa halgan fæderas beboden is.
Gif hyra hwylc geuntrumad biþ, þæt he ciricean gegan ne mæge, do his andetnesse on þan huse, þe he onwunaþ, on gesyhþe his gebroþra.
Gif heora hwylc butan þære neode and butan þæs abbodes hæse gedyrstlæcþ, þæt he ænige spræce wiþ hy age, eawunga oþþe dearnunga, he sy geþread mid þære stiþestan þreale.

Hæbbe se abbod swa gecorenne mæssepreost, ægþær ge deacon ge subdiacon, and Gode swa gecweme þurh halige drohtnunge, þæt him nan unhlisa ne fylge þurh ænigne fracodscype, ac heora goda hlisa gearweorþige þa, þe hy to þære mæssan þenunge gecuren.
